channel.title: Productivity on Hello Friend NG
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on Hello Friend NG

item.title: Productivity Life Hacks for Sofware Engineers
item.description: Productivity Life Hacks for Sofware Engineers. My co-worker, Abdullahi, encouraged me to write this post. Since I’m on Thanskgiving vacation, I thought why not? Plus, writting this post proves him correct; I’m very productive. I generally don’t think of myself as very productive. I was diagnosed with ADHD, like my father, and I’ve always tried to take on too many projects, jobs and challenges at once. I work 2 jobs, sometimes 3, I am a father of twin girls that are in school plus I make time to work on NatesCode blog posts, videos, exercise and be a son, boyfriend and play DnD.
